A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
What a poorly written Star Wars film where all 'surprises' or 'twist' were just there to be different from all fan theories for the sake of being interesting but instead came across as lazy and just plain boring whilst not being coherent or true to the characters themselves\,it is quite clear that Rian Johnson doesn't understand Star Wars at all..these are just some of the problems... 

1.Terrible amount of out of place humor 
2. Rey has no training except lifting rocks but can fight for some reason?
3. They made a big set up about Rey's parents in EP7 but they are nobody?
4.  Luke made a map to be found but doesn't want to be found?
5. The whole Canto Bight scene was just POINTLESS
6. Snoke was big disappointment\,they killed the most interesting character 
7. Kylo had no character arc\,he killed Snoke but still is weak?  
8. Why would Luke try to kill Kylo in his sleep..so out of character 
9. Luke had no fight scene...then he died because ???
10. Leia uses the force in the dumbest way possible
11. What is the point of not telling Poe the plans?
12 Yoda only acts like he's crazy or drunk in Empire Strikes Back because he's testing Luke\,when he reveals himself as Yoda the Jedi Master\,he shows his true self by being calm and wise\,....why in The Last Jedi does Yoda have act like he's drunk or crazy?????????  

I can literally go on and on with the problems in the film\,visually it was good\,acting wise\,it was good...everything else was rubbish..EPIC FAIL.
